name: Dual Purpose™
description: Dual Purpose™ is Non-Sag Formula, Excellent Open Time, Easy Clean Up, Exceeds ANSI A136.1 Type I & II Standards, Adhesive for Interior Installation of Ceramic Tile on Walls and Floors is high performance Type 1 ceramic tile adhesive for interior installation of all types of vitreous and non-vitreous ceramic wall and floor tile. Dual Purpose exceeds ANSI 136.1 Type 1 requirements for areas requiring “Prolonged Water Resistance”.
